highlightExtensionDescription.message: Highlights changes made to a website since last visit

highlightDisabled.message: SiteDelta Highlight is disabled for this page.
highlightDisabled.description: Text that monitoring of the current page is disabled

highlightEnabled.message: SiteDelta Highlight is enabled for this page.
highlightEnabled.description: Text that monitoring of the current page is enabled

highlightUnsupported.message: SiteDelta Highlight does not support monitoring this page.
highlightUnsupported.description: Title of the page action popup when not available for the current page

watchExtensionDescription.message: Regularly monitors a website for changes

watchUnsupported.message: SiteDelta Watch does not support monitoring this page.
watchUnsupported.description: Text that the current page is unsupported

watchDisabled.message: SiteDelta Watch is disabled for this page.
watchDisabled.description: Text that watching of the current page is disabled

watchEnabled.message: SiteDelta Watch is enabled for this page.
watchEnabled.description: Text that watching of the current page is enabled

watchFailed.message: SiteDelta Watch could not load this page.
watchFailed.description: Text that downloading the current page failed

watchNextScan.description: Label for the next scan time

watchNotificationChanged.description: Notification title when a change is detected

watchNotificationFailed.description: Notification title when a page cannot be loaded

watchNotificationUnchanged.description: Notification title when no changed page is found

pageFailed.message: Error getting page contents. Check the included regions.
pageFailed.description: Title of the page action popup when no contents are found

pageUnchanged.description: Title of the page action popup when no changes are found

pageChanged.description: Title of the page action popup when changes are found

pageSelectRegion.description: Title of the page action popup while selecting a region

pageEnable.description: Button to enable monitoring the current page

pageDisable.description: Button to disable monitoring of the current page

pageShowChanges.description: Button to show changes on the current page

pageNextChange.description: Button to show the next change on the current page

pageOpen.description: Button to open the current page

pageScan.description: Button to scan the current page

pageRequirePermission.message: SiteDelta requires your permission to access this page.
pageRequirePermission.description: Text that SiteDelta requires permission to access this page

pageGrantHost.description: Button to grant access to a given URL

pageGrantAll.description: Button to grant access to all addresses

pagesList.description: Headline for the list of monitored pages

pagesFilter.description: Placeholder text for page filter input

pagesDeleteOne.description: Button to delete the selected page

pagesDeleteMultiple.description: Button to delete the selected pages

pagesOpenOne.description: Button to open the selected page

pagesOpenMultiple.description: Button to open the selected pages

pagesOpenChanged.description: Button to open the changed pages

pagesOpenFailed.description: Button to open the failed pages

pagesScanOne.description: Button to scan the selected page now

pagesScanMultiple.description: Button to scan the selected pages now

pagesScanAll.description: Button to scan all pages now

pagesScanFailed.description: Button to scan the failed pages

pagesMarkSeenOne.description: Button to mark the selected page as seen

pagesMarkSeenMultiple.description: Button to mark the selected pages as seen

pagesMarkSeenAll.description: Button to mark all pages as seen

configRegionsAdd.description: Button to add a new region

configRegionXpath.message: XPath expression or CSS selector identifying the region
configRegionXpath.description: Text for manual xpath or css selector entry

configScanOnLoad.description: Label for checkbox to enable automatically scanning pages on load

configHighlightOnLoad.message: Automatically highlight changes on known pages
configHighlightOnLoad.description: Label for checkbox to enable automatically highlighting pages

configEnableContextMenu.message: Enable SiteDelta context menu on pages and button
configEnableContextMenu.description: Label for checkbox to enable SiteDelta context menus

configCheckDeleted.description: Label for checkbox to enable the check for deletions

configCheckImages.description: Label for checkbox to enable the check for image changes

configIgnoreCase.description: Label for checkbox to ignore case when checking

configIgnoreNumbers.description: Label for checkbox to ignore numbers when checking

configBackground.description: Tooltip for text fields with background color

configBorder.description: Tooltip for text fields with border color

configAddColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of added text

configRemoveColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of removed text

configMoveColors.description: Label for text fields for background and border color of removed text

configIncludeColors.description: Label for text field for border color of included regions

configExcludeColors.description: Label for text field for border color of excluded regions

configShowRegions.description: Label for check box to outline include and exclude regions

configMakeVisible.description: Label for check box to make hidden elements visible on highlighted pages

configStripStyles.description: Label for check box to remove CSS from highlighted pages

configIsolateRegions.description: Label for check box to remove elements not scanned by SiteDelta

configWatch.description: Label for text fields concerning watch / delay settings

configNotifyChanged.message: Show a notification when a page is changed
configNotifyChanged.description: Label for check box to enable notifications for changed pages

configNotifyFailed.message: Show a notification when a page cannot be loaded
configNotifyFailed.description: Label for check box to enable notifications for failed pages

configTransfer.description: Button to import or export settings / pages

configAdvancedDisabled.message: Advanced features (that require additional permissions) are disabled.
configAdvancedDisabled.description: Text that advanced features are disabled.

configAdvancedUnsupported.message: Your browser version does not support advanced features.
configAdvancedUnsupported.description: Text that advanced features are unsupported with the current browser version.
